p: This work refers to a study that aimed to investigate the chemical profile, analgesic, anti-inflammatory, and healing properties of different parts (roots, seeds, leaves, and capitula) of Anacyclus pyrethrum (L) endemic to Moroccan soil. Even though Manouze et al. (2017) studied the anti-inflammatory effect of Anacyclus pyrethrum, their work was limited to roots only, unlike in the present study, where we made a comparison between areal and root parts and even included samples from a different geographic area.
